job_tasks.phrase: GenAI-oplossingen ontwerpen, bouwen en beheren binnen Azure Cloud, waarbij transparantie wordt gewaarborgd in zowel prestaties als kosten.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the design, building, and management of GenAI solutions within a cloud environment, which aligns with the core software engineering task of developing and integrating features into a system.

job_tasks.phrase: De ontwikkeling van GenAI-gestuurde applicaties stimuleren met behulp van zowel low-code als high-code benaderingen.
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the development of applications, specifically those driven by GenAI, using different coding approaches, fitting the definition of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Oplossingsarchitectuur definiÃ«ren en bijdragen aan de ontwikkeling van de enterprise-architectuur voor GenAI-omgevingen.
job_tasks.justification: Defining solution architecture and contributing to enterprise architecture for GenAI environments involves understanding business needs and aligning technical solutions with broader strategic goals.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken met verschillende teams om vereisten te verzamelen en deelnemen aan prototyping en hackathons.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions collaboration with different teams and gathering requirements, which falls under communication and collaboration skills.

job_tasks.phrase: Kennis delen en teamleden begeleiden om een cultuur van leren en innovatie te bevorderen.
job_tasks.justification: Sharing knowledge and guiding team members to foster a culture of learning and innovation are clear examples of communication and collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: Op de hoogte blijven van de nieuwste trends in GenAI en Microsoft Azure Cloud om onze digitale initiatieven te verbeteren.
job_tasks.justification: Staying updated with the latest trends in GenAI and Microsoft Azure Cloud demonstrates a commitment to continuous learning and adapting to new technologies.

soft_skills.phrase: Samenwerken met verschillende teams om vereisten te verzamelen en deelnemen aan prototyping en hackathons.
Kennis delen en teamleden begeleiden om een cultuur van leren en innovatie te bevorderen.
Op de hoogte blijven van de nieuwste trends in GenAI en Microsoft Azure Cloud om onze digitale initiatieven te verbeteren.

profile.rationale: The job ad focuses heavily on designing, building, and managing GenAI solutions and applications, which falls under Macro-Category A (Software Development & Integration). While it mentions GenAI, it doesn't detail specific model development, fine-tuning, or prompt engineering tasks (Macro-Category B). The role emphasizes integrating GenAI into applications and contributing to enterprise architecture, aligning with the profile of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer who builds software that uses AI/ML as a core part of its functionality.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is reasonably clear about the tasks involved, focusing on the development and integration of GenAI solutions within a cloud environment. However, it lacks specific details on the exact nature of the GenAI models or techniques used, which would have increased confidence. The mention of both low-code and high-code approaches also adds a slight ambiguity regarding the depth of technical involvement.
